name: Open me
description:
Please open me.
I need you.
I know what you've done.
I know who you are...

This game is the sequel of the game "Don't open me" from the Me.exe series, I highly recommend playing it before playing "Open me"

Don't open me: https://mr-koroshiya.itch.io/dontopenme

If you liked "Open me" you can play the third episode "Kill me"!

https://mr-koroshiya.itch.io/killme
